name: Ezra: The Stranger
summary: An adventurous platformer with unique puzzles and charming environments.

name: Ez4u
summary: 23 incredible levels - layers of artifact which absorbed Boris. He needs to go out. Ez

name: EZ2ON
summary: EZ2ON is an online music game based on the arcade game called "EZ2DJ."

name: EZMuze Break and House edition
summary: EZMuze Break and House edition (EZMBHE) is an Xbox Live Community Game developed using Microsoft's XNA platform. Less of a game and more of a toy, EZMBHE allows you to create music using loops displayed as an array of squares. EZMBHE was followed up by ezmuze Hamst3r edition.

name: E.Z
summary: E.Z is a simple platformer game the goal being get across to the other side of each of the 100 levels... However, reaching the last one will be more of a difficult task than one may think.

name: EZ2Dancer
summary: EZ2Dancer is a series of dance video games developed by the Korean video game company Amuseworld. The gameplay of the series is similar to other dance simulation games, but unlike most games of their genre, EZ2Dancer incorporates both hand sensors and foot sensors into gameplay.

name: Ezy
summary:
A small 2D platformer in pixel style.
You play as a dinosaur "Ezy", you need to get to the castle, but it will not be easy.

name: Ezaron Defense
summary: A classic 3D Tower Defense fantasy game, made by a very small and dedicated team.

name: EZ2on Reboot: R
summary: EZ2on Reboot: R – Renowned rhythm game franchise EZ2on’s latest gem is to be released via Steam! Be ready to soak up all the fun EZ2on has to offer by playing the most popular hits throughout the series.

name: EZ2on: Reboot
summary: EZ2on: Reboot is an online music game based on the arcade game called "EZ2DJ."

name: Ezekial S. Jackson's Amazing Truckology
summary:
Amazing Truckology is a children’s computer game created by Ezekial S. Jackson that teaches children about a variety of trucks. There are four places to explore: the farm, fire station, the quarry, and the building site. Fifteen trucks are included in the game. There are also clickable hotspots in some of the scenes. There are some video clips and animations that shows the player the trucks on how it does and how they work. There are colour photographs on every truck included in the game, as well as some technical information.

Four Truck-A-Rama VR scenes are included in the game, as well as 3D animated models of the fifteen trucks included. The player can also simulate driving one of the fifteen trucks in the game as well. The game features background music which has 40 minutes of songs included. Amazing Truckology is suitable for ages 5 and up.

name: Ezra's Legacy
summary: Ezra's Legacy is an action packed 2d platformer game inspired in classics from the 80s, with 8-bit aesthetics, great soundtrack and awesome gameplay. If you want something new and exciting, but at the same time pay homage to the classics, then Ezra's Legacy is for you!

name: Ezamur
summary: Ezamur is a challenging platformer that consists of 4 stages each with it's own set of gimmicks and unique boss fights.

name: Ezerath's Last Hope
summary: A dungeon crawler, beat em' up RPG with an open world for you to explore.

name: EZ2on Reboot: R - Fortress Collaboration DLC
summary: FORTRESS Collaboration is the DLC for EZ2ON REBOOT : R.

name: EZ2on Reboot: R - DJMAX Collaboration DLC
summary: DJMAX × EZ2ON DJMAX Collaboration is the DLC for EZ2ON REBOOT : R

name: Ezerath Plus
summary: Expansion of Ezerath's Last Hope adding new regions, dungeons, monsters, and access to new items.

name: Ezekiel
summary: Ezekiel is a nine-map Doom II episode WAD for limit-removing source ports created by various mappers, led by Jon Vail (40oz). The first episode is based around fast-paced combat and 1999-style levels with a similar aesthetic to Hell Revealed 2 and Thy Flesh Consumed. Episode 2 features a swampy dark green and grey Heretic and Hexen styled aesthetic, with large layouts and large monster quantities. The unfinished third episode was meant to feature suspenseful exploratory levels with jump scares and high contrast lighting, in a theme featuring lots of cement, charred rock and vine textures.

name: Ezerath Mini
summary: Ezerath Mini is a spin off version of the game in a side scroller format. If you want to enjoy the game without needing to grind or think as hard, this DLC is right for you!

name: EzQuiz
summary:
Dive into EzQuiz, where hundreds of questions across diverse topics await to challenge your knowledge and sharpen your wits. How much do you really know?

EzQuiz has it all! Test your mastery across a universe of subjects in the most dynamic quiz game ever. Are you ready to become the ultimate quiz champion?

name: EZ2on Reboot: R - Hardcore Tano*C Music Pack vol.1
summary: A collaboration pack from 'HARDCORE TANO*C', a famous hardcore music crew in the rhythm game scene, and EZ2ON REBOOT: R! Experience the ultimate joy in the deeper and more diverse hardcore music!

name: Ezerath 3D
summary: The 3d remaster of Ezerath's Last Hope, featuring improved dungeons, more stats to upgrade your character with, and refined in-game systems!

name: EZ2AC: Endless Circulation
summary: EZ2AC : Endless Circulation is the 11th installment of EZ2DJ/EZ2AC series. It is the first game to adopt the new EZ2AC name, retiring its old EZ2DJ name and the first game to be officially released by SQUARE PIXELS as a whole company.

name: EZ-Talk Shokyuuhen 1
summary: The first entry in the EZ-Talk edutainment series for the Game Boy Advance. English phrases are spoken aloud by the character's mother, and the user follows those directions to complete minigames and tasks.

name: Ezrebeth
summary: Ezrebeth is an old, bitter recluse who finds herself constantly invaded by her peculiar relatives during the winter holidays. Oh, and she's stuck in a time loop! Investigate, interview and cross-reference as you attempt to figure out what's going on in this surreal visual novel.

name: EZ-Talk Shokyuuhen 2
summary: The second entry in the EZ-Talk edutainment series for the Game Boy Advance. English phrases are spoken aloud by the character's family, and the user follows those directions to complete minigames and tasks

name: EZ-Talk: Shokyuuhen 3
summary: The third entry in the EZ-Talk edutainment series for the Game Boy Advance. English phrases are spoken aloud by the character's family, and the user follows those directions to complete minigames and tasks

name: EZ-Talk Shokyuu-hen 4
summary: The fourth entry in the EZ-Talk edutainment series for the Game Boy Advance. English phrases are spoken aloud by the character's mother, and the user follows those directions to complete minigames and tasks.

name: EZ-Talk Shokyuu-hen 5
summary: The fifth entry in the EZ-Talk edutainment series for the Game Boy Advance. English phrases are spoken aloud by the character's family, and the user follows those directions to complete minigames and tasks

name: EZ-Talk: Shokyuu-hen 6
summary: The sixth entry in the EZ-Talk edutainment series for the Game Boy Advance. English phrases are spoken aloud by the character's family, and the user follows those directions to complete minigames and task.

name: Ezekiel
summary: Ezekiel is a clasic first person shooter that sticks to the fundamentals: satisfying weapons, eccentric enemies and cool environments. No annoying cutscenes, no cringe-worthy writing, and no taking control away from the player. Just pure chaos, carnage and a killer soundtrack.

name: Ezmeralda
summary: Ezmeralda is an action-packed top-down RPG where you explore dangerous dungeons, battle powerful bosses, and collect legendary loot. Master fast-paced combat, uncover hidden secrets, and forge your path through a world of adventure.
